questList.questDescription: In the Enchanted Grove, the sinister Whispering Shadows, under the command of the malevolent sorcerer Malum, threaten the balance of the forest. Your main quest is to vanquish the Bone Rattler, the leader of the Whispering Shadows, to bring peace back to the mystical woods.
The Corrupted Flora in the Enchanted Grove spreads decay and darkness. Eliminate the Experiment Gone Wrong to cleanse the forest of its blight.
The Forest Stalkers lurk in the shadows, threatening the balance of nature. Unite the Ant Legionnaire to aid you in restoring harmony to the Enchanted Grove.
At the Frosty Summit, the Frost Hydra, a creature of immense power, poses a great threat. Your main quest is to face the Frost Hydra and prove your strength against the icy predator.
The Frozen Hordes block your path with their formidable strength. Defeat the Frost Giant to clear the way to the summit.
The Chilling Beasts of the Frosty Summit are relentless in their icy assault. Unite the Glacial Brute to gain a powerful ally against the frozen foes.

Deep within the Shadowed Citadel, the Infernal Legion marches under the banner of Malum. Your final quest is to confront the Inferno Behemoth, the mightiest of Malum's minions, and bring an end to the darkness shrouding the realm.
The Abyssal Horrors lurk in the shadows, ready to unleash terror. Put an end to the Tempest Lizard to weaken the grip of darkness within the citadel.
The Inferno Guardians stand vigilant, protecting Malum's stronghold. Unite the Infernal Watcher to aid you in your final confrontation against the Abyssal Horrors.
